name: beta-cassandra
postInstallNotes:
DC/OS Cassandra is being installed!

	Documentation: https://docs.mesosphere.com/latest/usage/service-guides/cassandra
	Issues: https://docs.mesosphere.com/support/

	If you installed from the UI, enter `dcos package install beta-cassandra --cli` from the DC/OS CLI to install the Beta Cassandra CLI subcommands.
postUninstallNotes:
DC/OS Cassandra is being uninstalled.
For DC/OS versions from 1.10, no further action is required. For older DC/OS versions, follow the instructions at https://docs.mesosphere.com/1.9/deploying-services/uninstall/#framework-cleaner to remove any persistent state if required.
preInstallNotes:
This DC/OS Service is currently a beta candidate undergoing testing as part of a formal beta test program.

There may be bugs, incomplete features, incorrect documentation, or other discrepancies.

Default configuration requires 3 agent nodes each with: 0.5 CPU | 4096 MB MEM | 1 10240 MB Disk

Contact Mesosphere before deploying this beta candidate service. Product support is available to approved participants in the beta test program.
